	"trollsandelves_gold_income"
	{
		"BaseClass"       				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior" 				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
		"MaxLevel"						"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"            "alchemist_goblins_greed"
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"				"particles/msg_fx/msg_gold.vpcf"
			"particle"				"particles/generic_gameplay/lasthit_coins.vpcf"
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			
			"modifier_trollsandelves_gold_income"
			{	
				"IsHidden"						"1"
				"Passive" 						"1"
				"ThinkInterval" 				"1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"			"datadriven/ability_gold_income.lua"				
						"Function"				"GoldIncome"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}
